SIGNIFICANT ISSUES/SYMPTOMS/PROBLEMS: 

The patient expresses feeling worse today than yesterday.  Her thoughts of 
suicide are becoming more pervasive again.  She admits to considering trying to 
hurt herself again in her room here.  She

 depressed mood,  blunted affect,     Still quite sad.  Crying during a portion

ASSESSMENT:

Worse SI.  Danger to self again now.

PLAN:

1:1 sitter today. Reassess later today.  Will likely need to stay a few more

text.author: AVIVAUSER,SEVEN
